entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump 85,974 Americans have died from COVID-19 as of the latest count. Many could have been saved with preparation and quick, strong, decisive action. Instead weak, ignorant, self-centered  @realDonaldTrump delayed, waffled, lied, and gave out gross misinformation. Remember that 11/3!
